attributes.action: Invest more money into tackling homelessness
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to invest more money into tackling homelessness in the UK
attributes.background: I am a school student studying GCSE citizenship and for our project we want to raise money and awareness for homeless people.

rejection.details:
Thank you for starting your petition. Unfortunately we can't publish your petition as we already have an open petition calling for the Government to take action on this subject. You might like to sign that petition instead:

Increase funding to house and support the homeless
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614065
